title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 13 - New build available
description:
In this video we will look at what has been added and what has been fixed in the third beta release for Sim Update 13 which will be released in a few weeks. The list for the aircraft fixes and general fixes is pretty short. In this 3rd build it looks like the team has been mainly focusing on fixing scenery issues which were reported since the release of several world updates. Approximately 50% of the World Updates will get and update for one or more issues where Iberia is the one which is the winner with 16 fixes.
